allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: VPN Platform MVP

Full SaaS VPN management platform with NestJS API, Next.js frontend,
and OpenVPN node-agent. Includes multi-level reseller support, PKI
management, hard concurrency enforcement, Stripe billing, and
comprehensive audit logging.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(python3 -c "
import urllib.request, json
data = json.dumps\({''username'': ''admin@vpn-platform.local'', ''password'': ''admin123!@#''}\).encode\(\)
req = urllib.request.Request\(''http://localhost:3000/auth/login'', data=data, headers={''Content-Type'': ''application/json''}\)
resp = urllib.request.urlopen\(req\)
tokens = json.loads\(resp.read\(\)\)
token = tokens[''accessToken'']

# Now create a package
data2 = json.dumps\({''name'': ''Test Package'', ''duration'': ''1m'', ''description'': ''test'', ''maxConnections'': 2, ''maxDevices'': 3, ''priceMonthly'': 999, ''creditCost'': 0}\).encode\(\)
req2 = urllib.request.Request\(''http://localhost:3000/packages'', data=data2, headers={''Content-Type'': ''application/json'', ''Authorization'': f''Bearer {token}''}\)
resp2 = urllib.request.urlopen\(req2\)
print\(resp2.read\(\).decode\(\)\)
")
